title: nextleveltitle

onenter: You walk into a dimly lit quonset hut. There are many items lying on the floor around one central object. Then, you see it. A really big rocket launcher.
prompt: Do you choose to take it? (Y or N):

options.Y: You shouldn't have stolen that item!
